Element.name: InputPortDefinition
Element.Description:
An Input Port Definition is the entry point of the model defined by a Module Definition or Action Definition. Each Input Port Definition is referenced by a corresponding Input Port on the actual Module or, implicitly, by an actual Action.

All parameters added to the definition are made available on the referencing Input Port or Action and can be bound to external elements.

PropertyCategory.name: Appearance
PropertyCategory.Property: A distinctive icon displayed in the diagram and in the outline.
If checked, all parts belonging to this port definition will be displayed.
